DOC.brief_title: Multiple Ascending Dose Study BMS-820132 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Males female childbearing potential ( willing use acceptable method contraception ) , females nonchildbearing potential ( i.e. , postmenopausal surgically sterile ) . Diagnosis type 2 diabetes treat metformin monotherapy ( least 1500 mg/day least 6 month ) stable regimen least 2 month . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 40 kg/m2 . Fasting glucose range 125275 mg/dL . Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) range 7.0 % 11.0 % . Fasting Cpeptide > 1 ng/mL . Clinically significant deviation normal medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) , clinical laboratory determination , significant acute chronic medical illness stable well control hypertension , microalbuminuria , dyslipidemia , depression , hypothyroidism . History diabetic ketoacidosis , hyperosmolar nonketotic syndrome , lactic acidosis , hypoglycemia ( i.e. , ≥ 1 selfreported episode hypoglycemia within last 3 month ≥ 2 selfreported episode hypoglycemia within last 6 month ) , hypoglycemia unawareness . Any major surgery within 4 week study drug administration . Any gastrointestinal surgery could impact upon absorption study drug . Smoking 10 cigarette per day . Recent drug alcohol abuse . Women pregnant breastfeeding . Positive urine screen drug abuse . Positive blood screen hepatitis C antibody , hepatitis B surface antigen , Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) 1 , 2 antibody .
